articles.title: ECG can pinpoint hospitalized COVID-19 patients at high risk of mortality - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A simple electrocardiogram (ECG) can pinpoint hospitalized COVID-19 patients at high risk of death who might need intensive management. That's the finding of a study presented at EHRA 2022, a scientific congress of the European Society of Cardiology.
